grav_lens.testing package

Submodules

grav_lens.testing.memory_dataloader module

grav_lens.testing.memory_dataloader.measure_efficiency(dataset_loader, data_index, max_files_list, home='..\\..\\..\\data')[fuente]

Measures the efficiency of the dataset loading function.

Parameters:

dataset_loader (function): The function that loads the dataset. data_index (str): Index of the dataset. max_files_list (list): List of different sizes of datasets to load. home (str, optional): Home directory for the dataset.

Returns:

list of dict: Efficiency metrics for each dataset size.

grav_lens.testing.memory_dataloader.plot_efficiency(df_classic, df_numpy)[fuente]

Plots the efficiency metrics and saves the plots as images.

Parameters:

df_classic (DataFrame): Efficiency metrics for Classic Generators. df_numpy (DataFrame): Efficiency metrics for Numpy Arrays Generators.

grav_lens.testing.memory_dataloader.print_efficiency_report(efficiency_metrics)[fuente]

Prints a report of the efficiency metrics.

grav_lens.testing.memory_dataloader.save_to_csv(efficiency_metrics, filename)[fuente]

Saves the efficiency metrics to a CSV file.

Parameters:

efficiency_metrics (list of dict): Efficiency metrics to be saved. filename (str): Name of the file to save the data.
